channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 7th November
item.description:
This rubbish has been in Thornbury Close for months. Why have you not cleaned it up? I have previously reported this matter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, Alstone Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 7th November
item.description:
Yet more rubbish dumped in the usual place. Just 24 hours after you removed the last lot of crap that was dumped here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Pates Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 7th November
item.description:
EMERGENCY 2HOUR Damaged Sign Post Please Remove Standard TM - 15MDB (Damaged Sign Post)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Decomposed fox on side of carriageway, 7th November
item.description:
Decomposed fox on the side of Carriageway (has been there for some time as not much left)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 7th November
item.description:
Blocked drain, when it rains it does not flow down the drain and the road beomces like a swimming pool especially during rain falls.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 7th November
item.description:
FW: Overgrown Vegetation on Footway ( Needs clearing) 20 Mtrs x 1000mm Aprox TM: Traffic lights Use pinpoint (Overgrown Hedge)

item.title: Pothole is on the bend so might catch motorists unawares., 7th November
item.description:
On bend in Abbotswood Road as shown on the map.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbotswood Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 7th November
item.description:
Oak tree beneath phone lines, this has recently been pollarded (two days ago) but the top remains in contact with several phone lines to properties.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Same pothole you repaired last month. Poor repair standard, not surprised it's appeared again., 7th November
item.description:
Use your previous report.

item.title: Street light not working, 7th November
item.description:
It is outside number 18 Whittle Close, Stoke Orchard, Cheltenham, GL527SA. I have lived here for 12 months and it hasn't worked since I've been here.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29,30, Whittle Close, Stoke Orchard, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
